# The `MappingContextTraits` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class is similar to <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/yaml/mappingtraits">MappingTraits&lt;T&gt;</a> but allows you to pass in additional context for each map operation. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This class is similar to <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/yaml/mappingtraits">MappingTraits&lt;T&gt;</a> but allows you to pass in additional context for each map operation.

For example: 

<CodeBlock>
struct MappingContextTraits&lt;MyStruct, MyContext&gt; &#123;
  static void mapping(IO &amp;io, MyStruct &amp;s, MyContext &amp;c) &#123;
    io.mapRequired(&quot;name&quot;, s.name);
    io.mapRequired(&quot;size&quot;, s.size);
    io.mapOptional(&quot;age&quot;,  s.age);
    ++c.TimesMapped;
  &#125;
&#125;; 
</CodeBlock>

Definition at line 85 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/yamltraits-h">YAMLTraits.h</a>.

</DoxygenPage>
